learning_objective: Develop plans that describe a program’s sequence of events, goals, and expected outcomes.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Buzz’s Gym is creating an app to help gym-goers plan different workout routines. A successful plan should include warm-up, exercise order, and cool-down activities. Which of the following most accurately represents a program for a chest and back workout day?",
    "Answer1": "WarmUp()ChestPress(3, 10)DumbellRow(3,10)BenchPress(3,10)InclineDumbellPress(3,10)Pullup(3,10)CoolDown()",
    "Answer2": "CoolDown()BenchPress(3,10)ChestPress(3, 10)DumbellRow(3,10)InclineDumbellPress(3,10)Pullup(3,10)WarmUp()",
    "Answer3": "WarmUp()Pullup(3,10)DumbellRow(3,10)InclineDumbellPress(3,10)BenchPress(3,10)ChestPress(3, 10)CoolDown()",
    "Answer4": "WarmUp()ChestPress(3,10)BenchPress(3,10)InclineDumbellPress(3,10)Pullup(3,10)DumbellRow(3,10)CoolDown()",
    "CorrectAnswer": "1",
    "Explanation": "A proper workout routine begins with a warm-up, followed by the exercises in the specified order, and concludes with a cool down. Press exercises are typically performed before pull exercises."
}
